game.name: Overwatch® 2
game.categories: Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, Adjustable Text Size, Camera Comfort, Chat Speech-to-text, Chat Text-to-speech, Color Alternatives, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Stereo Sound, Subtitle Options, Surround Sound
game.shortDescription: 오버워치 2는 평단의 찬사를 받은 팀 기반 슈팅 게임입니다. 희망찬 미래를 배경으로 하며, 새로운 영웅들이 꾸준히 등장하고 있습니다. 친구들과 팀을 이루고 지금 플레이하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Overwatch 2 is a critically acclaimed, team-based shooter game set in an optimistic future with an evolving roster of heroes. Team up with friends and jump in today.

reviewHighlights.text: I cant fucking play because the battlenet account tells me im "not human" i guess ill just go recharge my baterries in tf2
i am never ever EVER touching this fucking game again. Not in a lifetime, under no circumstances. I've tolerated lack of new content, i've tolerated s...
